rule:
Inside each

tag, there must be at least one tag.
input: Cities are crowded. Villages are serene. Beaches are relaxing.
output:
Cities are crowded.

Villages are serene.

Beaches are relaxing.

Let me know if you'd like to experiment with emphasizing different words or phrases!
complianceText:
The chatbot output provides three sentences, each wrapped in its own `

` tag, thus complying with the requirement to have at least three `

` tags. Each sentence also includes one `` tag and one or more `` tags to emphasize key words or phrases, fulfilling that part of the requirement. There is no violation of the description that doesn't require knowledge of the input, as the compliance is evaluated without needing to check the appropriateness of the inputs or outputs regarding the content emphasized. No violation. OK
